website_summaries.verdict: This versatile bounce house is large enough for 5 children at a time. Worthwhile investment for several families to share.
pros: Its spacious 13x12 ft. floor, sturdy build, and long slide make it ideal for groups of kids
can accommodate up to 5 at a time
Has a safety net and removable sun shade
cons: Long-term sun exposure can weaken the nylon fabric
Some customers report seam leakage straight out of the box
Users may need stakes to tie the castle down to improve safety

customer_reviews.title: Weak entrance easily ruptures
customer_reviews.text: I really love the design of this bounce house. The bounce area is really large, and the slide is actually tall (but still safe with a good wall and net) and fast (the slide has a separate slick fabric top). With all that said, I’ve had two of them fail in the exact same front entrance portion with expected use by two 40lbs toddlers. The first unit lasted about 2 weeks of use. Amazon quickly sent me a replacement bounce house, but the new replacement broke in the exact same spot after only three uses.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: This thing is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: What’s not to like?? This bounce house is great! We got this bounce house in April of 2019 after we had initially bought another cheaper version. We have had this for almost a year now and it has held up really well! While it’s was a bit more expensive, it has been worth every penny! When we bring this out all the neighborhood kids come out and play for hours! We will see how much longer it actually lasts given how much heavy use it’s getting but again totally worth it! Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: NMarcus11

customer_reviews.title: Awesome until the blower dies
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son's birthday. It was fantastic until the blower stopped working correctly. It would shut itself off (not tripping the built in breaker). It would just stop, which is a scary endevor when there are kids inside the bounce house. I reached out to Bounceland on two occasions and have still yet to hear back. Needless to say, my little dude's heart is broken as his birthday present is pretty much useless now...
customer_reviews.author: They Call Me Sam

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service, nice bounce house
customer_reviews.text: This bounce house really is nice! It’s not huge. But my 7 and 10 year old enjoy it and we allow 1 friend. Smaller kids could fit 4-5. We sat this up right away and noticed one of the flaps had ripped some at the entrance. I took a photo and submitted to customer service not expecting much, maybe a $20 refund. But since I just paid all this money I wanted to try. To my surprise they responded the same day! Instructions on how to proceed and mailed us a new bounce house immediately! Sad that I was shocked with great service, but am very impressed!! The 2nd one is just fine too plus no rip.
customer_reviews.author: E. Low

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: This bouncer is big (but not too big) and fun! It has a fairly big jumping area, climbing wall, and a tall slide, fun for small kids and kids who are a bit older (even teenagers playing with younger siblings). Setup and takedown is very quick and easy, and it comes with a storage bag. A removable canopy over the jumping area is a great addition for sunny/hot days. It's pricey, but we decided to get it instead of installing a permanent playground. We just received it today (very fast delivery-thank you!) so I cannot yet comment on durability.
customer_reviews.author: Alla

customer_reviews.title: IMPORTANT... READ....
customer_reviews.text: IMPORTANT... READ....This thing is SOOOO cool! My kids love it. We used this for 3 separate parties and it paid for itself (versus renting) after the second one. It is SOOOOO easy to setup and take down. The kids all loved it and it is very well built. Just take care of it. Don't leave it outside for extended periods of time. With proper maintenance this thing should last A LONG TIME!
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: This was awful experience
customer_reviews.text: When we opened the box for our sons birthday party we were shocked to find a large piece of paper tape to the bounce house informing us that there was a tear in it when we removed the paper there was a slice about 7-10 inches long they did send patches but didn’t fit nor hold we when to the store to find anything that worked but because the tear was where the children entered and exited when needed to duck tape repeatedly and we had to tape it 3ft by 3ft right in front of the bouncer it was horrible experience for both the parents and the birthday boy
customer_reviews.author: Carmen vega

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This item is awful. Very cheaply made. When we first blew it up, we noticed the netting by the slide apart. 2 kids (ages 4 and 8) were jumping In it and we heard a POP! Couldn't figure out where. It blew back up, but when they got in. It wasnt the same. Literally had it 1 day. NOT WORTH THE MONEY AND ID LIKE MY MONEY BACK, OR A REPLACEMENT!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I was expecting better
customer_reviews.text: I may have had my hopes to high on this bounce house...the second time i opened it there was mildew all over it and this particular bounce house has a lot of fabric material rather than the plastic most bounces are made of so it is not as easy to clean with a spray to get rid of the mildew...and then it torn in two different spots at the top, not where the kids can even touch.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!!
customer_reviews.text: The kids love this bounce house! It is a little smaller then I had thought it was, but is still plenty big enough for our kids to play in with a couple friends! The material is strong and well stitched. We have only used it once so far but I (and the kids) love it! The stakes that come with it are very cheap and bent the first time we used them, but it doesn't really seem like they are important unless it's windy out. I also loved that this bounce house came with the blower, which we were having trouble with when we were searching for the perfect bounce house! Overall definitely a great investment!
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Great house!
customer_reviews.text: I got smart and decided to buy instead of renting! After doing tons of research I decided on this bounce house. I wanted a slide and a good sized jumper area. It was delivered fast with Prime. Both girls and the two neighbor boys love it. The canopy is important to keep the bounce part from getting to hot. The kids loved the basketball hoop as well. Also the slide is great. The kids also like jumping from the top of the slide into the bounce part. I used it for my younger daughters birthday and it was a hit. I'm sure we'll use it many times so it was worth it to buy one instead of renting.
customer_reviews.author: April Biederman

customer_reviews.title: Why rent when you can buy!
customer_reviews.text: I love the Bounceland Royal Palace Bouncehouse, my two and a half year old navigates his way in and up to the slide with ease. It is very easy to pack away and watching it inflate within 20-30 seconds is just as much fun for him! I choose to store ours in a large rubbermaid tub for extra protection but the included tote is sufficient. For the price this is at its great in lieu of a rental which can be very expensive, lets hope this will last for quite a few seasons!
customer_reviews.author: D. Sosa

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Our 6 and 8 yo kids plus the neighborhood kids all love this. Great buy for the price. We’ve had at last 5 kids in at once and it can take their abuse.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Ivey

customer_reviews.title: overall good product for the cost
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for two toddler boys ages 4 and 2. Since we just purchased for xmas, we have used about 5 times with one being a birthday party. It is very easy to setup and pretty easy to fold back away. I was surprised when I could actually get it back in the original bag because you know it goes after you use these products. The material seems durable and I haven't noticed any issues around the stiches. Hopefully this will last a few years.
customer_reviews.author: JFG

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty, easy to put up and take down.
customer_reviews.text: Ok....if you DON'T want to be the best and coolest grampa ever, then go ahead and not get this for your grandkids. I did and now I am. This bounce house is awesome. It only takes about 10 minutes to put up and just slightly more to take down, and yes 1 person can do it easily. Probably the longest time is waiting for the air to come out. Amazingly it goes right back in the case provided and yes it is quite heavy but not so much so that it cannot be maneuvered. My grandkids absolutely LOVE this!
customer_reviews.author: Rob in Indy

customer_reviews.title: Super fun! Great value!
customer_reviews.text: So far we love it! We purchased this for a baby shower we were hosting. We were expecting 10 kids but only 6 showed. It works great! Super easy to set up and take down. It’s super heavy though! I would suggest having someone help you set up and put away. Can’t say how it will hold up over time but we are storing it inside and in a rubber tote. The kids loved it! And having the cover was awesome because it did get very hot and sunny. The cover was a reason we picked this one.
customer_reviews.author: LOVEGATORS

customer_reviews.title: The little one loves this
customer_reviews.text: Pros Durable Fun for the kids Variety of activities - basketball, rock climbing, slide, bouncy house Inflated and deflates in minutes with the included pump. Includes a convenient storage bag Cons Pump must stay in to keep product inflated and is somewhat noisy , but not too overbearing.
customer_reviews.author: QikPass

customer_reviews.title: NOT durable at all
customer_reviews.text: I paid full price for this bounce castle and it popped in less than 3 months. I've stitched it together 4 different times and fixed it each time. However today it popped from the inside where the slide is and I can't fix it. This was for my 3 kids to have something to do at home. We loved this stupid thing so much and I can't express how much this SUCKS! So much money and I can't return or replace.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a must have
customer_reviews.text: How did I get along without it? Had it up pretty much 24/7 from the day it was delivered until winter weather set in. The motor is quiet, the bounce house is made out of great strong sturdy material. The kids can't wait for spring for us to drag it out again. I would definitely recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Nuthinbetter2do

customer_reviews.title: commercial grade bounce house
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend this bounce house, I have read alot reviews and compare price. This is the best bounce house with the price rage. I have own one now for 4 years, it is doing it job with no problem,when hot days in summer above 90 degree I hook up water hose at the top of the slide, kids love it, just make sure no water closed to the blower . My kids between 7 yrs to 12yrs {about 5 to 6 inside bounse house at the same time, no biggy} sometime I went in with them. this bounce house worth wise and it consider commercial grade . We love it...worth it
customer_reviews.author: Ann HONG

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful bouncer!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic bounce house! Bought to keep the kids occupied during “shelter in place”. The kids love it (especially the slide feature). Well made. Sturdy. So easy to blow up (blower included). You can blow it up in less than 3 minutes! It is on the heavy side so nice to have two people help fold up and put away.
customer_reviews.author: vivilinh

customer_reviews.title: NOT HAPPY WITH A $500 PURCHASE ONLY USED 6 TIMES
customer_reviews.text: HUGE HOLE RIPPED IN THE SLIDE ONLY AFTER A COUPLE OF USES! WE BRING IT OUT ONLY FOR OUR KIDS BIRTHDAY PARTY ( 2 A YEAR)! WE KEEP TRYING TO FIX THE WHOLE BUT IT IS TOO BIG! WE BOUGHT THIS HOUSE BECAUSE WE FIGURED WITH THE PRICE, IT WAS GOING TO BE HEAVIER DUTY. BUT IT WORE AND RIPPED ABOUT 8X10 HOLE RIGHT ON THE SIDE OF THE SLIDE SO VIRTUALLY IMPOSSIBLE TO REPAIR... NOT HAPPY WITH A $500 PURCHASE ONLY USED 6 TIMES
customer_reviews.author: autumn pearson

customer_reviews.title: Only worked for 1 month
customer_reviews.text: **edited to add, Bounceland customer service was unavailable, but Amazon's customer service was incredible as always and is helping me with the issue. We've had this item barely over a month. It was used for an hour or two 2 or 3 times a week, and the pump won't turn on at all now. For $500, I can't believe it lasted such a short amount of time. I'm really disappointed in this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for kids 10 and under! Super durable and easy set up.
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE this bounce house! It’s perfect! We have a 9 yr old, 4 yr old, and 2 yr old as well as friends over quite often and everyone can be in it jumping and sliding. I went in it to tear its durability and it still kept itself inflated. Our kids have had it up and played in it everyday since we got it. They LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Buy don't rent! This is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect for our 2 to 5 year old grandchildren. Keeps them moving in a circle and spreads them apart so less head bumps... I wish it had a slide/step outside the door. We put a mattress there because kids do bounce out... But all in all for the money, they love it!
customer_reviews.author: Catherine DuBois

customer_reviews.title: Good investment
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because my children (ages 4 and 8) are home with me all day. This was the best investment I could have made! Great quality, very easy to set up and fills with air quickly. Taking it down and packing up are easy as well. I also appreciate that they sent patches and thread in case there is ever a tear. Great product, great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best value out there!  Jumping fun.
customer_reviews.text: Got for our three year olds birthday party. Older siblings play in it too (9+7) with no issues) Pays for itself with one use (compared to renting similar equipment). We have used it multiple times and it is a great treat for all the kids. Strong blower, quality fabric and workmanship. Super easy to set up and take down. We are very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wow!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I researched so many options and finally landed on this bounce house. I have an 8 year old and 3 year old and this thing is perfect. I love the shade from the sun and it’s tall enough that my very tall 8 year old is safe!
customer_reviews.author: Kel

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!  Great value.  Good size.  Grandkids love climbing wall to slide.
customer_reviews.text: Oh my... our grandkids (4 of them ages 2 and under). Absolutely love this.... especially the slide. The ‘bouncy’ part if it is a bit tighter and not as bouncy. It inflates really, really fast and stays up. It is more than big enough for us. It takes a while to deflate. We carefully pushed remaining air out as we folded it for storage (in large tote). Putting it away is easier with 2 people. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Snoddy

customer_reviews.title: Oh What Fun!
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old loves this. Great way to get exercise in the winter at home. Don't know about longevity yet because we've only had it 1 month but will update my review if quality lacks over time. Right now though and general first impression is that this is a professional quality bounce house worth the money! The slide portion is also a big hit with daughter & neighborhood friends!
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy from Kansas

customer_reviews.title: Great until it rips
customer_reviews.text: It was great for 4 months of use and the. It ripped. The material in some spots seems thinner and now it no longer holds air. Hope Santa makes the others with better quality. Sad kids today.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Blefeld

customer_reviews.title: So much fun!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our 4 year olds birthday - she and our 2.5 year old loved this! It is a great size for family use but if you are thinking about this for a party I would be nervous to have more than 2/3 kids in there. The jumping area is a good size but kids have no situational awareness:)
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for kids under 10!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect bounce house for younger children! I have a n almost 6 year old and a 19 month old and they are loving it so far! It’s very sturdy for younger kids, but not made for older kids/adults. Goes up And down very fast and easily! I spent months researching the perfect bounce house and this was definitely the best size, quality and price wise! Also the seller was extremely fast at shipping! I had it within 3 days of placing the order. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Amy S

customer_reviews.title: Like another customer I had been considering a swing set
customer_reviews.text: Wow! We are really loving this thing! Like another customer I had been considering a swing set...my yard is small so such a permanent fixture would be intrusive. I did a lot of research prior to purchase. This bouncer is actually a little smaller than I expected which was perfect for me. Sooo easy to use..sets up in 2 min. Deflate time longer but no issue. Quality seems very good. The grand kids come over, ages 2-7 and they are so excited. They end the day filled with laughter and exhausted!
customer_reviews.author: lh

customer_reviews.title: Sliding in and out
customer_reviews.text: Fun had by all. I got tired of renting bounce houses for partys, it became pricey and sometimes were filthy. This is a very good buy. Great quality and a nice size. My children love. Quick inflate and deflate and is sturdy. I like the slide on the side because it keeps the kids circulating in and out. Of course you have to monitor children to ensure it doesn't tip but having the slide avoids too many kids wanting to stay inside all at once.
customer_reviews.author: Online Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Mid-Sized, Kids Love, Gets Hot on Summer Days
customer_reviews.text: I like it, but it gets really hot on sunny days. I'd recommend one with water over this one; although one with water takes a long time to dry out. Either way, this is a solid, high quality jump house. Brought it out on a fall night the other day and the kids loved it.
customer_reviews.author: JB_From_MD

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for this price/ Good price for the size.
customer_reviews.text: Definitely worth it... got a small tear at the slide opening but nothing bad. Had it since August last year; this is our second use and it fired right up and is in great condition. Store it properly and it should last for years!
customer_reviews.author: Blythe M

customer_reviews.title: Great Bounce House
customer_reviews.text: We have loved this bounce house. We have used it 4 times now and plan to use it all summer long. Worth the investment. My kids are 5 and 3 and they and their friends love to bounce in it. The shade on the top keeps things a little cooler. The air blower works great. Not for adults and I would not put teens in it. But great for littler kids. We have had kids up to 9 in it, and have had no problems so far. It is well made, and we have had no rips, tears, and no issues around the seems.
customer_reviews.author: Troy S. Fox

customer_reviews.title: It is easy to set it up and take it down
customer_reviews.text: It is a very well made bouncy house. It is easy to set it up and take it down. It can fit about 5 kids in the bouncy house it self. The slide is pretty good too. Long enough for kids to enjoy it. The screened walls do their job of protecting the kids and the fabric roof provides the shade we need sometimes. We are very happy with tis purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sylwia Stachura

customer_reviews.title: Good Material, Bad Sewing
customer_reviews.text: Sewing on the outside of the slide came undone after only being used two times. Able to stick two fingers through it. Had no more than 200 lbs on it at one time.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Travis Hoke

customer_reviews.title: JOY!
customer_reviews.text: What a GREAT Christmas gift for all of our Grands to share. All five loved it, and their 200 pound Grandpa got in there to wrestle with them all. EXCELLENT QUALITY!
customer_reviews.author: TanyaBo

customer_reviews.title: Good castle for our prince
customer_reviews.text: No issues yet. Toddler loves it. I just notice discoloration on certain areas and some roughly sewn parts. I hope they hold up. It's hard for a toddler to climb into so he needs help. He figured out the way to climb the slide and has a blast coming down. The material on the bouncy portion is heavy weight plastic like seen in commercial jumpers. The posts and slide are heavy fabric. It's the perfect size. I wouldn't go with a jump area smaller than this.
customer_reviews.author: Average smo

customer_reviews.title: product deflates quickly and easyly fits in storage bag
customer_reviews.text: bought bounceland for my granddaughter she loves it and it provides fun for her while we are stuck at home. she loves the slide and i'm sure when she outgrows it I have nieces and nephews I can hand this down to. great product for the times we are in to keep kids active
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really good customer service who replaced immediately when our netting got ...
customer_reviews.text: Really good customer service who replaced immediately when our netting got torn. 5 and 7yo boys love the bouncehouse, lots of room. powerful blower.
customer_reviews.author: Youngrin L. Kim

customer_reviews.title: Our 2 toddlers LOVE it!
customer_reviews.text: We’ve had it about a month and my two toddlers still want to use it every day. I can’t believe we didn’t buy a bounce house sooner! I was going to buy a different model with a ball pit, but I’m so glad I opted for the large slide. It’s terrific!
customer_reviews.author: Kate in NYC

customer_reviews.title: Covid-19 life saver
customer_reviews.text: We have thoroughly enjoyed our bouncy house. It has kept my 6 & 3 y/o boys very entertained during this time.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley G.

customer_reviews.title: Customer Service is Outstanding
customer_reviews.text: The bounce house is fantastic but even more fantastic is their customer service. Our first bounce house had some misaligned stitching and holes. We sent them a picture and they were very friendly and accommodating and sent us a new bounce house the next day. They totally stand by their warranty which is hard to find know a days. Great product. Great company.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This is great its just smaller thsn i expected for some reason . but its easy to set up and easy to put back you may want a second person to help put it away though lol. I wish it was taller so i could jump in it to lollol
customer_reviews.author: hailea

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: So easy and was fanatastic. Kids loved it and had zero issues. I put it up in my family room and it was tight but worked and I can easy turn it on and off. It infates and deflates quickly and is super easy to fold up to put away. LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: SHELLBELL

customer_reviews.title: Great company
customer_reviews.text: Great seller and would buy from them again. Great product and even better company
customer_reviews.author: Wing Har

customer_reviews.title: Happy toddler
customer_reviews.text: Used it two days so far and worth every penny to see how happy it makes our girl. Seems sturdy and well made and an adult can sit in there with comfortably if needed with their kid.
customer_reviews.author: Sophia Lynn

customer_reviews.title: My 1 & 3 yr old LOVE it! We pull it out on weekends when ...
customer_reviews.text: My 1 & 3 yr old LOVE it! We pull it out on weekends when the weather is nice and we don't have plans. It's perfect for little kids. It's easy to put out and easy to put back up. My husband can do it all by himself if needed. It's a snug fit getting back in the bag but it fits. Once in the bag it's about the size of a large pice of luggage so it fits easily in the garage.
customer_reviews.author: Mgaskins

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it!
customer_reviews.text: We have used ot for one event and it worked well!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!!
customer_reviews.text: Soooo much research! This was the perfect choice!!! Soooo much fun!
customer_reviews.author: Donna Knapp

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, soft and smooth seems good for children. Easy to blow up and put away.
customer_reviews.author: Joe O.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect summer gift!
customer_reviews.text: Grandson loves it! Perfect for burning energy of little kids. Study and fun! Easy set-up!
customer_reviews.author: sharon

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Great bouncer! My kids absolutely love it.. Can hold many little ones..had it up for my daughters third birthday and we had six little ones her age jumping and sliding and it held up great.. Very easy to put up as well as take down.. I can roll it away in bag but have my husband store it for me.. It inflates quickly and the slide is a great height. Motor is quiet too,,
customer_reviews.author: Greeneyedragonfly

customer_reviews.title: Great bounce house! Lots of fun!!!
customer_reviews.text: Grandkids love this bounce house! They especially love the slide. Easy to put up and take down. Very sturdy. 500 pound weight limit is nice. We have 10 grandchildren but it's nice because an adult can go in the house with a couple of kids.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Has a whole right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Easy to aet up and the kids love it. However I set it up for the first time to find a hole in the air line. It is still usable but I am sure that will limit its life.
customer_reviews.author: HooverADF

customer_reviews.title: Grandkids loved it.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for 5 grandkids ages 3-9 and was perfect. They all loved it and my sons said it was easy to put up and take down. Will be perfect for inside or outside.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley bennett

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy materials, bright colors
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy materials, bright colors, grand kids love it, used 4 times so far, so it paid for itself, compared to renting, make sure though recommended age wieght is followed, i had nephews jump in without me noticing they did rip seam in two places, able to repair easily with a upholstery thread and needle , so i think great
customer_reviews.author: allen leblanc

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money
customer_reviews.text: No more rental bounce houses. Will pay for itself in one more use. And we only used it once and loved it! Had 8 kids comfortably inside and they had a blast.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Hendrickson

customer_reviews.title: Everything as expected
customer_reviews.text: Product seems to be made well. Had it for about a month and used it about 5 times. Easy to set up and takes a little bit to put away. The boys (3,5) enjoy it. Bouncing area seems big enough and very happy I chose to get the slide. Good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: redrooster

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for small parties or for kids to burn off some energy. It blows up quickly and is easy to fold up and store.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Our 1st setup right out of the box, 3rd ...
customer_reviews.text: Our 1st setup right out of the box, 3rd child down the slide - seams ripped open. They ripped on the right toward the bottom of the slide at a spot where a child could have caught a foot or hand in the hole.
customer_reviews.author: marc

customer_reviews.title: great house!
customer_reviews.text: Our grand kids love the bounce house. They are 5 and almost 2. It is easy to put up and down.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck in Pennsylvania

customer_reviews.title: The kids love it and it holds up well with 5 kids ...
customer_reviews.text: Update: 2020...we’ve had this for 4.5 years, it’s still working amazing and the kids still love it! Worth every penny! We have had this for 2 months and use it every day or every other day! The kids love it and it holds up well with 5 kids playing inside. Plenty of jump space and they are obsessed with the slide. Easy for toddlers to climb up to the slide also! We love it! Also it actually fits in the bag provided!
customer_reviews.author: CJM2185

customer_reviews.title: Great bouncy house
customer_reviews.text: Great product and good price. Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Great bounce house!
customer_reviews.text: I did so much research when looking to buy my daughter a bounce house. This is not a commercial bounce house, so it is not huge, but it is a very nice size! The material is nice, as long as you take care of it, ie not leaving it outside for days to let earth destroy the material. I live in Texas so we know how much the heat can harm many materials. This was a great buy, and worth every penny spent!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Don’t hesitate...it’s awesome and big.
customer_reviews.text: If you want a bounce house get this one! I am 100% satisfied. We had two 10 year olds and one 4 year old playing and it was big enough for them plus some. And we were easily able to get it into the bag it came with not problem, with room to spare.
customer_reviews.author: Stetson Beasley

customer_reviews.title: LOADS OF FUN
customer_reviews.text: Our smaller Little Tikes bounce house recently ripped (after 2 years) so we decided to invest in a more durable and large bounce house. I highly recommend this one. The slide is an added bonus; my toddlers will race up and down over and over.
customer_reviews.author: katiebaba88

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: First of all paid too much for it to rip on first use. My 5 and 4 yr old played for about an hour and had to put it away. They were not happy. So not only did it rip but the outer wall of slide got really fat and started to sag.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Good Size & ok Built
customer_reviews.text: Good Size & ok Built. Kids Enjoys it. However the threading is not too robust, & there is some air leakage at certain places. Hopefully can survive the jumping.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Loh

customer_reviews.title: Disgusting and stained
customer_reviews.text: Disgusting can’t believe I spent $500 for a “new” jumpy and in the days of hoarding thanks to corona virus I don’t even have a Clorox wipe to clean off this disgusting mess and it’s obviously stained. So gross and who knows what else is on it that I haven’t seen yet.
customer_reviews.author: Cute

customer_reviews.title: Never rent another bounce house again!
customer_reviews.text: We bought the bounce house in 2016 after renting one for $300 for one day. 4 years of use, lots of birthday parties and it is still awesome! Easy to put up and fits back into its bag easily. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend this!  Best bounce house!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best home bounce house I have seen. Its a bit pricey but worth it. I have 4 kids ranging from 2-11 and they all bounce without a problem. We plan to have so much fun with it this summer. Used it for a party and a play date also and it has held up fine. Very easy to set up alone too. Love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: mommy4

customer_reviews.title: My grandson who is 19 months has so much fun bouncing in the bounce house
customer_reviews.text: My grandson who is 19 months has so much fun bouncing in the bounce house. He can climb up and slide down the slide easily. It has become his favorite thing to do. There is plenty of room for him and my two other grandchildren to jump at the same time. It is easy to air up and only takes about 3 minutes. I highly recommend this Bounce House House.
customer_reviews.author: McCool

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, good size
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, good size, quiet, easy to put up. Although it's tough for my toddler to climb into it right now, just made her a step until she grows a little. We will use this for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Veydas#One

customer_reviews.title: Great little bounce house
customer_reviews.text: i searched for months for the right bounce house. So glad I decided to go with this one. The size is just right. We have a 2 year old. We use the bounce house at parties and family get togethers and all the kids love it. Seems to really be really sturdy. No issues yet, and my lab even jumped on it (before I had time to get him off) and his paws didn't puncture the fabric. sets up in seconds.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew L.

customer_reviews.title: Fun for the kids!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and price. I can see it being a bit heavy for some people to move around but it seems very durable. Once you drag it to your spot, run the extension cord and hook up the fan the house is ready for use within minutes. I like to put a tarp underneath first for some added protection. (Dont forget to stake it down as it will move around. Already have put many hours of use on this already with multiple kids on this at the same time and should have no problem getting a few years out of this one!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly good quality, easy to set up and take down.
customer_reviews.author: STEVE K.

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!!
customer_reviews.text: Goes up very easily, good quality. The kids stayed busy with the climbing wall and slide, so glad we didn't just get a jumping one. Deflates easily also. I wish it were a little smaller so I could put it up inside during the winter!
customer_reviews.author: piperroon

customer_reviews.title: This is a great bouncy house
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bouncy house! Totally worth the money. We use it for play dates, parties and more. We are able to fit in in our garage even in the cold winter months. We have had it for 2 years. Well worth the money for hours of active fun!
customer_reviews.author: Ship

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it!
customer_reviews.text: Got this item delivered much earlier than told. Setup was straight forward and easy. Kids got on it immediately. Looks great so far. It includes stakes and carry bag. I’ll update this review in a month or two.
customer_reviews.author: Vijayanand Arungurikai

customer_reviews.title: beautiful! the kids had a lot of fun but ...
customer_reviews.text: beautiful! the kids had a lot of fun but its not for large crowd because the inside clothing got ripped off by the kids after the first use.
customer_reviews.author: rebecca amoo

customer_reviews.title: 7 months in, Not too bad !
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this bouncy house !! My daughter spends hours of fun on it! Only thing I didn’t like is that the inside scuffs easily . Besides that, it’s a really great product so far.
customer_reviews.author: CalliTheGreat

customer_reviews.title: Absolute Home Run!
customer_reviews.text: Absolute home run. No way you can go wrong with this. The reviews and videos are spot on. Kids from 2 to 12 love it. I get in it and roll around and slide, very very strong and sturdy. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: DMV

customer_reviews.title: its huge....mainly for outdoor unless you have a tall space
customer_reviews.text: Love it....kids love it. its strong and durable and easy to setup/teardown. only downfall so far is cleaning it in our new world of sanitation
customer_reviews.author: J Vinluan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bouncy house
customer_reviews.text: Great buy ! Industrial strength ! Sets up in 2nds . Need two ppl to fold and put away and roll on it to get air out . Def recommend
customer_reviews.author: kristin mueller

customer_reviews.title: Best bouncy house ever!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our grandsons 5 and 2 years old. They love it. Especially the slide. Definitely a 10!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this bounce house & fast setup.
customer_reviews.text: Keeping my daughter entertained. The CORONAVIRUS has alot of fun things closed for the children this summer. She absolutely loves the bounce house.
customer_reviews.author: Lady bug

customer_reviews.title: The kids love this thing
customer_reviews.text: The kids love this thing. Its roomy and durable. If you do not stake it down it will tip over! Just a warning. We are also going to upgrade the stakes. It comes with little plastic ones.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Muscarella

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality
customer_reviews.text: The first day we used it a large piece of stitching ripped. The stitching continues to weaken. Very poor quality. The kids love it but it isn't going to last very long sadly
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for 3 kids in backyard
customer_reviews.text: Only day 2 but this has been great for our 3 kids - very easy to set up and so far tough enough for play. Very happy
customer_reviews.author: Michelle P

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this inflator and the air pump went out the first day
customer_reviews.author: DMV AUTO FINANCE

customer_reviews.title: reliable and good product
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old daughter and her friends enjoy it a lot. It is a good product. It can hold 4kids around 5 at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Sudip Ghosh

customer_reviews.title: They love it and its easy to setup and take down
customer_reviews.text: Used several times with kids aging from 2 to 6. They love it and its easy to setup and take down.
customer_reviews.author: Boca Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Held 8 kids comfortably
customer_reviews.text: Great bounce house! We had 8 kids between the ages of 3 and 9 in it and it held up great.
customer_reviews.author: kevin mcneil

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing
customer_reviews.text: Really great product. We bought it about six months ago and it's still going strong. We mainly use it for birthday parties, but sometimes we just pop it up for a weekend activity with the boys. The shipping was fast and the business was great to work with.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: If your going to rent one atleast 2-3 times for parties you might as well buy this...great for the family. easy to use and set up and take down. a little heavy in the bag - but it can be done - holds me and my 2 year old. will be fine for 5+ kids.
customer_reviews.author: JOSH CAULDER

product_meta.title: Bounceland Royal Palace Inflatable Bounce House, with Long Slide, Large Bouncing Area, Basketball Hoop and Sun Roof, 13 ft x 12 ft x 9 ft H, UL Strong Certified Blower, Castle Kids Party Theme
product_meta.description:
In this charming royal castle, kids can bounce, climb, slide and play basketball. Bouncing room has inside jumping area of 8.5 ftx7 ft. Fun climbing wall leads to platform for a 10' long slide. Sun roof for those sunny days (velcroed, so it can be on or off). Multiple features make this bounce house our top seller. Easy set up in less than 1 minute.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
In this charming royal castle, kids can bounce, climb, slide and play basketball. Bouncing room has inside jumping area of 8.5 ftx7 ft. Fun climbing wall leads to platform for a 10' long slide. Sun roof for those sunny days (velcroed, so it can be on or off). Multiple features make this bounce house our top seller. Easy set up in less than 1 minute.Maximum individual weight: 100 lbs
feature_bullets: [Specification] Inflated size: L 13 ft x W 12 ft x H 9 ft, Package includes: bounce house, blower, carry bag, stakes, repair kit and instruction. Weight limit: Max weight: 500 lbs, Max individual weight: 100 lbs. Max number of kids: 5. Easy set up and take down, inflates in less than a minute. Perfect for indoor and outdoor use. Carry bag provides easy portability.

[Quality Assurance] 1) Heavy-duty puncture proof material with double to quadruple. 2) Half way velcro opening for safe and easy access 3) Bouncing surface made with heavy-duty commercial grade material for long-lasting bounce house 4) Strong secure 9" ground stakes 5) 6 ft Long air intake tube 6) Basketball hoop with velcro connection for safety 7) Extra slide cover provides extra protection, easy cleaning and is conveniently replaceable. 8) Higher rails for safer sliding fun

[Safety Standards] Bounceland products have been tested and approved for meeting and exceeding current world-wide requirements. We have been certified by ASTM (consumer safety), 16CFR1500.3/16CFR1505 (materials safety), CPSC (manufacturer certified), and UL (blower certified) with 25 ft power cord and GFCI plug (Recommended for all electronic toys by the American Consumer Safety Committee). Note: 120V only for northern American market.

[Satisfaction Guaranteed] Product satisfaction is our goal. All Bounceland bounce houses come with a 90-day limited warranty covering manufacturing defects. Blowers come with a one-year limited warranty. Experienced customer service always available to help you with your products.
[Perfect Gift] Perfect gift idea for children to stay fit and active. Physical exercise and interaction with friends to replace screen time.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
